>
> -- Lynxiz --
>
> Lynxiz perks up as an unknown panther bot comes into view. "Lynxiz
> Transform." She murmurs quietly. Her form folds, and paws become
> powerful arms and legs. She frowns, "Who are you?" Wary, but not
> entirely battle ready, she looks over the bot. She is surprised when
> her mild sensors pick up that he is a Maximal. "You're a maximal! I
> heard the base fire off a few shots, do you know what happened?"
> Lynxiz was almost at ease after that last discovery.
>

{Panthos}

    Panthos twisted as he finally came down from the side of a base the
turrets fire still hot on his tail accepting a stinging blast across his
lower back. Staggering a bit he called out "Panthos Maximize!" His robotic
form shifting falling to all fours as the dark panther beast mode claimed
him. Turning towards the voice for a moment he looked back over his shoulder
at the approaching trio, giving a smile he bounded towards the brush calling
out to Lynxiz "Name's Panthos, I'd stop to chat but it seems I wore out my
welcome already..."
